rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment states a factual status ('no cases... have been found') without framing language.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This reports a positive fact (no cases) but lacks explicit calming/reassuring language from the source.
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast.
'no cases of H5N1 infection have been found' is a bare negation without additional calming language.
